name: playwright-typescript-ui-api-framework
description: Playwright Typescript automation framework for UI and API tests.

scripts.pretest: rm -R -f dist && rm -R -f config && rm -R -f allure-report && rm -R -f allure-results
scripts.all:tests: npm run pretest && npx bddgen && npx playwright test --grep @regression
scripts.e2e:tests:headed: npm run pretest && npx bddgen && npx playwright test --headed --grep @ui
scripts.e2e:tests: npm run pretest && npx bddgen && npx playwright test --grep @ui
scripts.api:tests: npm run pretest && npx bddgen && npx playwright test --grep @api
scripts.generate:allure:report: npx allure generate allure-results && npm run posttest
